segments.text: I do want to meet with you and take a look at your catalogue . We ’ re redecorating and are going to add some things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ ll be glad to help you out . I can come out anytime on Tuesday or Thursday of next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s put it down for 1:15 on Thursday . We ’ ll definitely need some new filing cabinets and at least one desk unit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . I ’ ll bring both our office furniture and equipment catalogues on Thursday .
segments.speaker: S2
